name: Carol Emeka
description: Like many members of the Aldecaldos, Carol is a veteran of theUnification War, from which she has unpleasant memories of being stuffed in panzers. In 2077, Carol's clan leaderSaul Brightwas kidnapped during a patrol by aRaffen Shivgang called theWraiths. A distressed Carol acted in his place while worrying about Saul's wellbeing, the clan's supplies being stuck outsideReno, and the prospect of the Wraiths returning due to the vulnerable state of the camp.Panam Palmer, a fellow Aldecaldo who had seperated from the clan earlier, would not stand with their inactivity and took it upon herself to...
